availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel S. Mizener (Nicholasville, Jessamine County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Nicholasville, Jessamine County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Rosa Smith Mizener. Father of John Mizener, Hamlet Mizener, and Caroline Mizener. Graduated from Columbia College in New York, New York, in 1844. Physician in Garrard County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Nicholasville, Jessamine County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, District 1, p. 261B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, Nicholasville, p. 124.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994042, Jessamine County Deaths.
Catalogue of the Officers and Students of Columbia College for the Year 1864-65 (New York: D. Van Nostrand, 1864), 55..
"Samuel S. Mizner (1815-1876)," Find A Grave, Memorial 122947333, accessed June 16, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/122947333.
